infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app requires access to your contacts to allow you to select and share them.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to allow you to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to allow you to pick and upload images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save images to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app collects data to improve user experience and deliver personalized content.
